name: Paul Kuehn
text: I can’t say enough good about how Brandon took care of me. A couple of buddies and I were traveling back from Daytona Beach to Arkansas when we experienced a tire separation and broken leaf spring on the trailer. Brandon saved our trip by providing outstanding service to get us back on the road safely. He even gave us a great restaurant recommendation since we were all hungry. Thanks again for the prompt customer service.

name: J Irby
text: I highly suggest anyone to shop here. I will not be buying anything trailer related from anyone else. I was very satisfied with the service I received. I would give more stars if I could.

name: Conner Jung
text: Great group that will help you out in anyways and make suggestions on what you should do or don't have to worry about. They aren't there to rip you off. They are there to help and get you back on the water as quick as possible. They have great prices that you can't hardly find anywhere.

name: Daniel Payton
text: This is my new go-to spot for all things trailer related. Best customer service in town hands down.

name: Vaughn Traywick
text: Brandon and his crew did a great job setting up a trailer for my new boat.  They even notified me (and photographed) a few major issues with the actual boat that I will get resolved with the manufacturer.  This is outstanding customer service.

name: Scott Dauenheimer
text: They have everything you need to repair a trailer or buy a new boat trailer at the best price I could find any where within 100 miles.

name: JWDozer
text: Very impatient.  Looking at a boat that was still on the internet... "don't have it bye!"

name: divots dad
text: Brandon and his staff  offer the BEST prices and service in Mobile hands down!

name: Johnathan Schemerhorn
text: Great honest operation here I called 20 trailer places in the entire area only one who called me back and got me a trailer Fast and fair prices

name: Ryan Brightman
text: Brandon was a life saver this weekend.  I had a hub blow out on the side of the road on a Saturday.  Brandon was nice enough to meet me at his shop on a Saturday to sell me a hub to get me going.  Best customer service experience I have had in years.

name: Jason Riemann
text: Best place in Mobile for Quality trailer parts and service, boat sales, and engiine service. 4 tires and wheels installed and engine serviced in a few hours! More fishing time.  Can’t recommend anyone else.

name: Travis Poling
text: Great in every way! Friendly service and GREAT prices and selection. THE place to go for everything boat trailer related.

name: Josh McNickle
text: I purchased a boat from recreational sales and service just over a year ago and was very pleased with service received from Brandon during my purchase. I have and will continue to refer people to recreational sales and service for all boating and trailer needs. Great place!

name: Glen Chaplin
text: Have used several times and always had great service.  Have called ahead to see if they could stay past closing time for me to pick up what I needed!

name: chad palmer
text: We have a multi boat charter business and could not do it without these guys. Fast super friendly and great in stock inventory

name: Thomas Miller
text: Great service. Will definitely go back

name: Ben Nelson
text: Excellent selection of trailer parts in stock

name: Reese Swartz
text: Man, what a bunch of nice guys!  Great transaction!

name: Jon Dreaden
text: If you need trailer parts or service,  this is the only place to go.  Very friendly staff.

name: Robert Rhodes
text: Brandon and his staff always have what we need at great prices & great service.

name: Michael Robinson
text: Best place to get what you need for your trailer

name: riverrat1946@yahoo.com Lunceford
text: Great place to get your boat fixed or tailer parts and repaired

name: Greg Callaghan
text: Brandon is very knowledgeable, I was looking for boat trailer parts

name: Aaron Allen
text: Needed help on the side of the road and not from the area. Brandon was refered to us and had everything to get us going. Thanks

name: Judson Taylor
text: Excellent customer service. Friendly. I got just what I needed no extras.

name: jonathan brown
text: You may have 99 problems a trailer problem shouldn't be on that lost with a place like this. Brandon has got it together, Mobile has needed a place like this for a long time.

name: Shirley Olson
text: Very professional and polite

name: David Rinaldi
text: Done right. Done quick

name: Marc Mott
text: Everything you need for your trailer and more.

name: Butch W.
text: Knoesgable and Friendly

name: Rod Cromer
text: Knowledgeable,  friendly and helpful

name: Hayden Lunceford
text: Nice place to do business.

name: H Pipkins
text: Great service!

name: Brandon Lunceford
text: Was blown away buy the inventory and cheap prices.

name: Cory Blanton
text: Purchased a used Stratos from Dawson in February of this year ('21). The sales experience was great and very thorough. The staff even stayed late to give me some maintenance tips for motor longevity. After using the boat for a few months, I'm even happier with the treatment at Dawson. Highly recommended.

name: Jessie Brock
text: Like everyone else has already said... awesome experience buying a boat from Dawson Boat Center. Good people who are willing to go out of their way to help  you get what you need. 10/10

name: Allen McPherson
text: Greg Dawson has always been great with all my boats. I would recommend Dawson Boat center to anyone interested in Ranger boats.

name: Donald Anderson
text: Very nice place, very friendly and eager to help you get what you need for your boat and trailers

name: Casey Jones
text: I purchased a pre-owned 2019 Ranger RT188 and couldn't be happier with the boat and the price was more than fair considering the condition of the boat. I still can't believe the boat was pre-owned it looked brand new. If you wan't a no hassle sales process ask for Joel and you will be pleased with how simple he made the process for me. We financed the boat and the finance company they use in house made it easy and was simple and transparent.  I would recommend Dawson Boat Center for anyone looking for bass boat.

name: Fred Rivers
text: Great folks to do business with. Although I purchased a used Ranger somewhere else, they have helped me tremendously as a first time Ranger owner. If I ever upgrade to a new boat I will go to Dawson Boat Center.

name: Randolph McArthur
text: Only been there twice for parts and both times unbelievably rude.

name: Sylvia McBride
text: I think this is the Only place my hubby uses for his boat needs... For years...

name: Mark Mason
text: Always great

name: JASON FOSTER
text: I have no words to describe the quality of the service I've received from this business. From top to bottom you're treated like family! Thank you all for the amazing family that you share with the public. Joel, you're outstanding in the down to earth approach you brought to me and I'm sure that you do with the rest of your customers.

name: michael petty
text: Not very nice

name: Scott Leisure
text: Would highly recommend - was on vacation from Indiana and ran into trailer problems that would’ve prevented us from leaving on time. Dawson’s took time out of their already busy day and got us going in no time. I really appreciate their kindness and understanding to help us out in a pinch. Thanks again!

name: Humminbird Tips & Tricks
text: I have been going to Dawson's for a few years now. I live in TN but I will travel the hour and a half just to go here for all my boat servicing needs. Their customer service is amazing and their maintenance team is top notch! Highly recommended!!!!

name: Tom Mclemore
text: Greg n his team give great service and he can't be beat on Ranger prices. They have been in business for years for a reason, service after the sale.

name: Heath Grubbs
text: Very sweet people and very very helpful! I would strongly recommend them. They treat you like family. And they were the only one that had the part in Scottsboro or guntersville that I need for my Minn Kota!

name: Tammie Mann
text: Very nice place. Always willing to help in any way they can. I even broke down on the water one time. They brought the parts to me to fix the boat. Just bought a new one from them .

name: Matt Tibbs
text: U can get pretty goods deal on boats go see them

name: Carl McGuire
text: Very friendly,  patient and informative, with lots of Ranger boats on display.

name: sarah harpenau
text: i had boat trouble on guntersville lake and they dropped what they were doing and worked on my boat and got me going right away. Mark from Santa Claus, in.

name: Ed Hood
text: good shop, great folks, usually a looong waiting list!

name: JERRY Carter
text: I like Dawson Boat Center. Love their customer service.

name: Debbie Fanning
text: Very helpful service and the owner, Greg Dawson, is very easy to work with.

name: rusty summers
text: They had what I needed..

name: Deborah Fiddler
text: Owner has great presence.

name: Eric Prewett
text: Excellent products

name: Crystal Ball
text: Terrible parking lot,  didn't see all the holes for being filled with rain, hit one so bad, now car isn't driving right, pulling to the left.

resp.text: Sorry about your vehicle, but we keep our parking lot well paved with no potholes.

name: Joey
text: Came in from out of town to fish broke down the staff was Friendly went above and beyond to get me back on the water the same day

name: Glenn Priest
text: Great Guys to deal with !

name: mike clinard
text: Great place to do busibess

name: Steven Spurgeon
text: I brought the Speaker and they installed the amp,  and I am very pleased  with these guys.  They were very Professional and Friendly and I will be back in the future! Thanks for hooking me up with a Great Sounding System!!

name: Shai G
text: Awsome service, if anything needs to be altered they let you know. Very professional and quick. They updated the factory radio in two of my vehicles. The only place I go to for my audio needs.

name: Rachel Nix
text: Excellent spot for getting your car hooked up with a solid stereo. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable. Prices are fair. Highly recommend!

name: John Lindsey
text: Absolutely phenomenal work. I have a 2014 Tacoma double cab (very limited space) and they made it hit HARD and sound very clean. Very nice people and do very clean work. 10/10

resp.text: Thank you so much! If you need anything else just let us know

name: Haley Thornton
text: Come see us for all your audio needs! Tint, mobile DVD players, backup cameras, we have it all 😊

name: Ida Dyer
text: Great customer service everybody was friendly and helpful.

name: Frederick Abbott
text: They do good work in the timely manner. My only concern was no one there wears a mask doing this pandemic and when my car was returned it smelled like cigarette smoke. I don't smoke

name: steve Copeland
text: If you're in the market for some great car audio sound, see these guys. They offer layaway, and a couple different finance options.

name: Aaron Wade
text: Due to the nature of my job I am away from home five days a week (truck driver). Read the reviews on Google and gave them a call. Upon my arrival staff was extremely welcoming and professional. To my surprise I was able to get my vehicle serviced on a Saturday with no appointment. Installation price was competitive. Definitely worth the hundred plus mile drive!

name: William Joo
text: Im give one they want make jokes and not listen to what was wanted for my car

name: James Stout
text: Good people that are knowledgeable and perform quality work! Price's competitive, convenient waiting area inside. I've had them to perform work on 2 of my vehicle's so far and haven't had a problem yet 🙂

name: Jenna Hansford
text: This place is amazing! Just left this shop with a brand new radio. Great job! They were very hard workers and fit me in all within 1 hour! I highly recommend!!!

name: chauncy king
text: At first I would have gave 5 stars because they were friendly people they fit me in without an appointment. But then I few months after they installed my music it all started going out one speaker at a time until the point where no sound at all was coming out. So after that I decided to take matters into my own hands because I used to install music myself years ago. upon removing the panels from my doors an getting to the back of the speakers it was obvious that the wiring used on my speakers was very cheap because it had already dry rotted after a few months. I was able to get all my speakers back working again but then a few months after that they're already going back out only two of the speakers are working. so all-in-all I am not too happy about the job that was done on my vehicle.

resp.text:
Hi Mr. King.

Unless we're installing an amplifier or have reason to suspect that there is an issue with the wiring we just use the factory wire that's in the vehicle.

We also give you lifetime warranty on your labor. So if there was an issue you could have brought it back to us to check it out at no charge

name: Michael Tittle
text: Justin and crew are good people.. Been there several times and each time I'm met with Honesty and a good deal. If Sundown and DD are what your audio goal is then this is the place in north AL you need to be. Oh, and Hailey is kinda cool too lol..

name: Justin Nix
text: Went the shop. They are very knowledgeable about car audio and some great prices on DD and Sundown. That’s right they carry SUNDOWN. Possibly the first  dealer in North Alabama to do so. They had a Tahoe there with 8 15s in a 4th Order that got down and was just pure nasty on the Lows. It was a windy day at CarTunes in the Hoe. Thanks for the DEMO guys.

name: Nick Gist
text: I just had all of my truck speakers and a cd player installed at Car Tunes of the Shoals and I am very pleased with the quality and service that I received! My speakers sound amazing and I didn't have to pay an arm and a leg either! I will definitely be back there soon. I have found my new Audio shop! Thank you Justin for the great service and for the good quality sounding speakers! I will definitely recommend your shop to anyone who needs great sounding speakers installed.

name: Randy Taylor
text: Nice friendly people they know what there doing good prices only place I'll go for now on for my system needs

name: Bradley C
text: Justin is super helpful and will give you the sound you need. 🔊🔊🔊

name: Mikel Miller
text: Go holla at Justin over at car tunes! He'll always do u right!

name: Ronda Frank
text: The staff genuinely care about you and your needs. They do not try to upsell you with stuff you don't need. I will be returning!

resp.text: Thank you for your business! We enjoyed working with you!

name: Omega Richardson
text: Great customer&quality service! I will definitely return again!

name: Keith Abernathy
text: Justin and Benton are true professionals, they made my budget system sound like it cost hundreds more, thanks guys

name: Ya boy Jbonez
text: Awesome place and great people really good prices I’ll be back💯 They installed a KENWOOD DNX994s and all the modules job came out perfect 👌🏼

name: 87 Chevy Caprice
text: Good people

text: For all your smart start needs

name: Betty Nestle
text: Like there service

resp.text: Thank you! We greatly appreciate it!

text: Love my tint job

text: Owner and staff are wonderful.

name: Michael Powell
text: Awesome
